channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Amazon Updates Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra Price With New Special Offer
item.description: The Galaxy S25 Ultra price war heats up. Amazon drops the Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra to $899 for Black Friday. But Samsung's trade-in prices remain the ...

item.title: In India, Children From Climate-Vulnerable Districts Face Greater Risks Of Stunting & Wasting
item.description: A recent study revealed that children living in the most climate-vulnerable districts in India are at a greater risk of not only being underweight but...

item.title: Campbell’s Soup fires exec after leaked recording berating ‘poor’ customers and ‘bioengineered meat’ prompts outrage and investigation
item.description: The comments were caught on a recording by a now-former employee.

item.title: Storms sweep from Houston to Minneapolis, complicating Thanksgiving travel for millions
item.description: Parts of western New York and northern Michigan are expected to see lake-effect snow Wednesday through Friday.

item.title: Supreme Court to hear Texas landlord’s lawsuit against the Post Office for failing to deliver mail for 2 years
item.description: The DOJ argued that if the landlord wins, people will infer mail didn’t arrive “because of a rude comment that they heard, or what have you.”

item.title: Tariffs have surprising effect on unemployment and inflation patterns, Fed analysis reveals
item.description: The San Francisco Federal Reserve warns that current tariffs are "unprecedented in magnitude" compared to 40 years of trade data, making economic pred...

item.title: ‘Low-hire, low-fire’ economy grinds on as lower-than-expected jobless claims suggests layoffs aren’t spiking
item.description: U.S. applications for unemployment benefits in the week ending Nov. 22 dropped 6,000 from the previous week to 216,000, the Labor Department reported.

item.title: Recent college grads are losing their edge in the job market, study shows
item.description: The unemployment gap between college and high school graduates has reached its lowest level in decades, according to a new report from the Cleveland F...

item.title: Americans can’t agree on what ‘middle class’ means anymore, and they’re debating it in the comments of TikTok home tours
item.description: The "average" or "normal" home tour is fascinating, even dividing, thousands of Americans on TikTok who can't agree on social class.

item.title: Here’s The Exact Time ‘Stranger Things’ Season 5 Releases On Netflix This Week — Volume 1 Episode Runtimes, Season 4 Recap, Trailer And More
item.description: Here's when Stranger Things Season 5 lands on Netflix in your timezone, plus what to expect from Volume 1.

item.title: Turkey Still Frozen? How AI Can Rescue Thanksgiving Disasters
item.description: Many households are turning to AI as an emergency hotline for everything from last minute menu pivots to oven triage.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
